fieldDescription:
Peak Performance Time in seconds. 

A value equal or larger than 1000000 (or 100k) seconds will result in infinite Peak Performance Time or PPT.

Combat Readiness reduction per second multiplier when Peak Performance Time runs out.

A value less than 1.0 means that the ship CR will reduce slower.

Multiplier to the supplies per month of a ship.

A value less than 1.0 means that the ship will consume less supplies per month.

Multiplier to the ship fuel usage.

A value less than 1.0 means that the ship will consume less fuel/ly.

fieldName: Multiplier to supplies for ship deployment
fieldDescription:
Multiplier to the supplies used when a ship is deployed.

A value less than 1.0 means that the ship will consume less supplies per deployment.
Extra storage capacity for the ship.
Extra fuel capacity for the ship.
Extra crew capacity for the ship.
